CrashInstanceDebug.name: Crash Test
CrashInstanceDebug.predictiontext: The next area you create will crash.

DelayInstanceDebug.name: Delay Test
DelayInstanceDebug.predictiontext: The next area you create will stall for 10 seconds.

DelayCrashInstanceDebug.name: Delay and Crash Test
DelayCrashInstanceDebug.predictiontext: The next area you create will stall for 10 seconds then crash.

AtziriDropsVaults.name: The Queen's Vaults
AtziriDropsVaults.predictiontext: You will slay Atziri, Queen of the Vaal, and gain access to her Vaults.
AtziriDropsVaults.flavourtext: The Red Queen holds the key to her vaults, and only death will loosen her grip.

TormentedSpiritDropsUnique.name: The Singular Spirit
TormentedSpiritDropsUnique.predictiontext: You will slay a Tormented spirit that carries a unique item.
TormentedSpiritDropsUnique.flavourtext: A life spent fleeing from the law leaves the spirit ready to escape with its newfound treasure.

ExileDropsAllRare.name: The Wealthy Exile
ExileDropsAllRare.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile who wears only rare items.
ExileDropsAllRare.flavourtext: They flee from the eyes of Oriath, coated in gold from head to toe.

ExileSummonsWarband.name: The Scout
ExileSummonsWarband.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile, who calls forth a Warband.
ExileSummonsWarband.flavourtext: One like you roams the land, but they are just the first of many.

StrongboxSpawnsExile.name: Waiting in Ambush
StrongboxSpawnsExile.predictiontext: You will be attacked by a Rogue Exile when opening a Strongbox.
StrongboxSpawnsExile.flavourtext: A chest of goods hides many challenges, but one goes unseen even to the wise.

AlchemistDropsAlchemyOrb.name: The Alchemist
AlchemistDropsAlchemyOrb.predictiontext: You will slay an Undying Alchemist, and it will drop an Orb of Alchemy.
AlchemistDropsAlchemyOrb.flavourtext: A fool tries to turn lead to gold, but a deft hand takes it by force.

RoyalActBossDropsRegalOrb.name: A Regal Death
RoyalActBossDropsRegalOrb.predictiontext: You will slay a very powerful king or queen, and it will drop a Regal Orb.
RoyalActBossDropsRegalOrb.flavourtext: Blue blood drains from a cut-throat, and turns what it touches to gold.

VaalSideBossDropsVaalOrb.name: The Corrupt
VaalSideBossDropsVaalOrb.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful enemy in a Vaal side area and it will drop a Vaal Orb.
VaalSideBossDropsVaalOrb.flavourtext: To plow a field, you need a tool. To harvest grain, you need a tool. To spread corruption, you need a tool.

IzaroDropsAdditionalTreasureKey.name: The Emperor's Trove
IzaroDropsAdditionalTreasureKey.predictiontext: You will slay Izaro and he will drop an extra Treasure Key.
IzaroDropsAdditionalTreasureKey.flavourtext: Lost in his own creation, the Emperor leaves a generous parting gift for the precise.

InnerTreasureMonsterDropsAdditionalUniqu.name: Nemesis of Greed
InnerTreasureMonsterDropsAdditionalUniqu.predictiontext: You will slay a rare but powerful foe who then drops two unique items instead of one.
InnerTreasureMonsterDropsAdditionalUniqu.flavourtext: A collector of antiquities doubles their treasures, relinquishing them only with their final breath.

UniqueMonsterDropsUnique.name: SHOULD NOT APPEAR
UniqueMonsterDropsUnique.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful monster, and it will drop a unique item once slain.

HillockDropsTheAnvil.name: The Blacksmith
HillockDropsTheAnvil.predictiontext: You will slay Hillock and he will drop a powerful item.
HillockDropsTheAnvil.flavourtext: Long ago, a master of metal, now a shaper of fear. But his greatest tools remain.

PossessedMonsterSpawnsTormentedSpirit.name: Forceful Exorcism
PossessedMonsterSpawnsTormentedSpirit.predictiontext: You will kill a foe possessed by a Tormented Spirit, freeing the spirit.
PossessedMonsterSpawnsTormentedSpirit.flavourtext: A pained spirit hijacks a body, and will not be stopped by that body's demise.

MapBossDropsRareMap.name: The Dreamer's Dream
MapBossDropsRareMap.predictiontext: You will enter a certain map, and when you slay the very powerful foe that has made it its home, it will drop a rare map.
MapBossDropsRareMap.flavourtext: The greatest threat, deep in dream, holds the key to another world.

MapShavronneBrutus.name: The Aesthete's Spirit
MapShavronneBrutus.predictiontext: You will find the tormented spirit of Shavronne near Brutus. You will slay Brutus while he is possessed by her spirit.
MapShavronneBrutus.flavourtext: The echo of the Aesthete haunts her greatest creation, bestowing great powers once more.

MapKoleBrutus.name: Brothers in Arms
MapKoleBrutus.predictiontext: You will encounter Brutus and Kole deep in Axiom Prison, and slay them both.
MapKoleBrutus.flavourtext: Two men, transformed into monsters, fight together to hold the gate.

MapDoedreStoneCircle.name: Echoes of Witchcraft
MapDoedreStoneCircle.predictiontext: You will travel to the stone circle in the Western Forest, and destroy the Echo of Doedre Darktongue who waits there.
MapDoedreStoneCircle.flavourtext: A circle of silent giants imprisons a memory of undying misery. A dark tongue whispers dark words carried by the western winds.

MapKadakaKuduku.name: The God of Misfortune
MapKadakaKuduku.predictiontext: You will destroy the false idols Kuduku and Kadaka
MapKadakaKuduku.flavourtext: Pagan mouths worship pagan gods; false idols for false promises.

MapMaligaroFidelitas.name: Echoes of Mutation
MapMaligaroFidelitas.predictiontext: You will find the Echo of Maligaro in the Chamber of Sins and destroy it.
MapMaligaroFidelitas.flavourtext: Perverse loyalty, blind love, the abuser and the abused reunited in sin.

MapDaressoMerveil.name: Echoes of Lost Love
MapDaressoMerveil.predictiontext: You will find the Echo of Daresso in the Cavern of Anger and destroy it.
MapDaressoMerveil.flavourtext: Twisted by temptation, tempted by corruption, the Siren's song finally calls forth a fragment of her lost love.

MapExtraHaku.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraHaku.predictiontext: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.
MapExtraHaku.flavourtext: Prognosticating impending doom, a master survivalist seeks aid.

MapExtraTora.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraTora.predictiontext: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.
MapExtraTora.flavourtext: Prognosticating impending doom, a master survivalist seeks aid.

MapExtraCatarina.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraCatarina.predictiontext: You will find Alva and complete her mission.
MapExtraCatarina.flavourtext: Blind to all but gold, a master treasure hunter seeks aid.

MapExtraVagan.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraVagan.predictiontext: You will find Alva and complete her mission.
MapExtraVagan.flavourtext: Blind to all but gold, a master treasure hunter seeks aid.

MapExtraElreon.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraElreon.predictiontext: You will find Niko and complete his mission.
MapExtraElreon.flavourtext: Maniacally digging in endless darkness, a master miner seeks aid.

MapExtraVorici.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraVorici.predictiontext: You will find Niko and complete his mission.
MapExtraVorici.flavourtext: Maniacally digging in endless darkness, a master miner seeks aid.

MapExtraZana.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraZana.predictiontext: You will find Zana and complete her mission.
MapExtraZana.flavourtext: Lost in the miasma of dream, a master of many realms seeks aid.

MapExtraEinhar.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraEinhar.predictiontext: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.
MapExtraEinhar.flavourtext: Prognosticating impending doom, a master survivalist seeks aid.

MapExtraAlva.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraAlva.predictiontext: You will find Alva and complete her mission.
MapExtraAlva.flavourtext: Blind to all but gold, a master treasure hunter seeks aid.

MapExtraNiko.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraNiko.predictiontext: You will find Niko and complete his mission.
MapExtraNiko.flavourtext: Maniacally digging in endless darkness, a master miner seeks aid.

MapExtraJun.name: A Master Seeks Help
MapExtraJun.predictiontext: You will find Jun and complete her mission.
MapExtraJun.flavourtext: Pursuing a world of perfect balance, a veiled master seeks aid.

MapCorruptedSideArea.name: Hidden Vaal Pathways
MapCorruptedSideArea.predictiontext: You will enter a hidden Vaal area that contains powerful enemies.
MapCorruptedSideArea.flavourtext: Ancient foes open new paths to the land they left barren.

MapSpawnRareZombies.name: The Undead Brutes
MapSpawnRareZombies.predictiontext: You will seek out and destroy a group of seven powerful undead.
MapSpawnRareZombies.flavourtext: Powerful soldiers of a forgotten time reunite and march once again.

MapSpawnRogueExiles.name: The Four Feral Exiles
MapSpawnRogueExiles.predictiontext: You will enter a map that holds four additional Rogue Exiles.
MapSpawnRogueExiles.flavourtext: In a faraway dream, four souls far from home prepare to fight to the death.

RareMonsterKillSpawnsUniqueBloodElementa.name: Risen Blood
RareMonsterKillSpawnsUniqueBloodElementa.predictiontext: You will kill a powerful monster, whose blood takes on a new form.
RareMonsterKillSpawnsUniqueBloodElementa.flavourtext: Life flows through the blood. Let slip the blood, and the life will continue in a new form.

SellingFiveUniquesToVendorReturnsRandomU.name: The Mysterious Gift
SellingFiveUniquesToVendorReturnsRandomU.predictiontext: You will trade five unique items with a vendor.
SellingFiveUniquesToVendorReturnsRandomU.flavourtext: A merchant seeks to trade misfitting gifts. Five for one, but what is the one?

ChaosOrbRecipeCreatesAdditionalChaosOrb.name: A Valuable Combination
ChaosOrbRecipeCreatesAdditionalChaosOrb.predictiontext: You will receive an extra Chaos Orb from a vendor when you trade items that would result in a Chaos Orb.
ChaosOrbRecipeCreatesAdditionalChaosOrb.flavourtext: When the sum is already greater than the parts, there is room to make it greater still.

RollingSixSocketBodyArmourLinksAllSocket.name: Fated Connections
RollingSixSocketBodyArmourLinksAllSocket.predictiontext: You will create a fully-linked six-socket item using only Jeweller's Orbs.
RollingSixSocketBodyArmourLinksAllSocket.flavourtext: Five and fewer stand alone, but six draws them together.

ItemAbleToBecomesUniqueWhenChanceOrbAppl.name: Trash to Treasure
ItemAbleToBecomesUniqueWhenChanceOrbAppl.predictiontext: You will turn a normal item into a unique item with a single Chance Orb.
ItemAbleToBecomesUniqueWhenChanceOrbAppl.flavourtext: A blank canvas holds untold potential, but the artist's fortunate hand transforms it into a masterpiece.

ArmourAbleToBecomesFiveLinkedWhenJewelle.name: The Jeweller's Touch
ArmourAbleToBecomesFiveLinkedWhenJewelle.predictiontext: You will create a fully-linked five-socket item with a single Jeweller's Orb
ArmourAbleToBecomesFiveLinkedWhenJewelle.flavourtext: The Jeweller leaves five fingerprints and connects them with a single thread.

MasterMissionExtraRewards.name: A Gracious Master
MasterMissionExtraRewards.predictiontext: You will complete a Master's mission and will receive triple favour.
MasterMissionExtraRewards.flavourtext: A desperate ally seeks your aid, and will lavish you with appreciation.

SkillGemDropsWith20QualityAllocatedToYou.name: Erasmus' Gift
SkillGemDropsWith20QualityAllocatedToYou.predictiontext: You will discover a 20% quality gem.
SkillGemDropsWith20QualityAllocatedToYou.flavourtext: The kind gemcutter scattered his beautiful craft for the paupers, but greedy hands hide them.

KillingKaomWithKaomsSignAddsSpecificMod.name: The King's Path
KillingKaomWithKaomsSignAddsSpecificMod.predictiontext: You will defeat Kaom while holding Kaom's Sign.
KillingKaomWithKaomsSignAddsSpecificMod.flavourtext: Madness feeds the King's fury in the raging mouth of the volcano. His last vision will be a sign.

KillingGemlingLegionareWithKaruiWardAdds.name: The Karui Rebellion
KillingGemlingLegionareWithKaruiWardAdds.predictiontext: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while holding Karui Ward.
KillingGemlingLegionareWithKaruiWardAdds.flavourtext: Thaumaturgy and faith clash among giant ruins; a recreation of a long-gone rebellion.

KillingDaressoWithBramblejackAddsSpecifi.name: The King and the Brambles
KillingDaressoWithBramblejackAddsSpecifi.predictiontext: You will defeat Daresso while holding Bramblejack.
KillingDaressoWithBramblejackAddsSpecifi.flavourtext: The Blade King's blood feeds brambles that grow ever thicker.

KillingShavronneWithShavronnesPaceAddsSp.name: The Flow of Energy
KillingShavronneWithShavronnesPaceAddsSp.predictiontext: You will defeat Shavronne while holding Shavronne's Pace.
KillingShavronneWithShavronnesPaceAddsSp.flavourtext: The Aesthete sustains herself in unnatural ways. When movement fails, energy flows.

KillingNightwaneWithDeathsHarpAddsSpecif.name: The Bowstring's Music
KillingNightwaneWithDeathsHarpAddsSpecif.predictiontext: You will defeat Nightwane while holding Death's Harp.
KillingNightwaneWithDeathsHarpAddsSpecif.flavourtext: The brittle archer's bow plays a song of death, but the harp sings a sweet masterpiece.

KillingBeyondUniqueWithBlackheartAddsSpe.name: From The Void
KillingBeyondUniqueWithBlackheartAddsSpe.predictiontext: You will defeat Bameth while holding Blackheart.
KillingBeyondUniqueWithBlackheartAddsSpe.flavourtext: The iron heart, burned in the blackness of the void that lies beyond sight, rots all it touches.

KillingGneissWithCragheadAddsSpecificMod.name: Heavy Blows
KillingGneissWithCragheadAddsSpecificMod.predictiontext: You will defeat Gneiss while holding Craghead
KillingGneissWithCragheadAddsSpecificMod.flavourtext: Living stone strides across the field, each step shakes the earth and rattles the soul.

KillingHatebeatWithBlackgleamAddsSpecifi.name: Fire and Brimstone
KillingHatebeatWithBlackgleamAddsSpecifi.predictiontext: You will defeat Hatebeat while holding Blackgleam.
KillingHatebeatWithBlackgleamAddsSpecifi.flavourtext: Living cinders set the stone alight, a gleaming signal in the blackness where husks are burned.

KillingTorchoakGroveWithArakuTikiAddsSpe.name: A Forest of False Idols
KillingTorchoakGroveWithArakuTikiAddsSpe.predictiontext: You will defeat Torchoak Grove while holding Araku Tiki.
KillingTorchoakGroveWithArakuTikiAddsSpe.flavourtext: A grove of wooden faces spit fire, a cheap mockery of unimaginable power.

KillingHailrakeWithHrimsorrowAddsSpecifi.name: Fire and Ice
KillingHailrakeWithHrimsorrowAddsSpecifi.predictiontext: You will defeat Hailrake while holding Hrimsorrow.
KillingHailrakeWithHrimsorrowAddsSpecifi.flavourtext: Cold sorrow turns to burning fury that hails across the shattered ship.

KillingShavronneWithCrownOfThornsAddsSpe.name: Pleasure and Pain
KillingShavronneWithCrownOfThornsAddsSpe.predictiontext: You will defeat Shavronne while holding Crown of Thorns.
KillingShavronneWithCrownOfThornsAddsSpe.flavourtext: A single thorn slips through stretched skin; pain turns to power.

KillingGemlingLegionnaireWithEzomytePeak.name: The Bloody Flowers Redux
KillingGemlingLegionnaireWithEzomytePeak.predictiontext: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while holding Ezomyte Peak
KillingGemlingLegionnaireWithEzomytePeak.flavourtext: Ezomyte banners flutter through the air as embellished monsters fall, a reenactment of the slave's final victory.

KillingGraviciusWithDeidbellAddsSpecific.name: Dying Cry
KillingGraviciusWithDeidbellAddsSpecific.predictiontext: You will defeat General Gravicius while holding Deidbell.
KillingGraviciusWithDeidbellAddsSpecific.flavourtext: The bell tolls, the people gather, the General is executed. The militia cries out and charges forth.

KillingDoedreWithChaliceOfHorrorsAddsSpe.name: Mouth of Horrors
KillingDoedreWithChaliceOfHorrorsAddsSpe.predictiontext: You will defeat Doedre while holding Chalice of Horrors.
KillingDoedreWithChaliceOfHorrorsAddsSpe.flavourtext: The vile witch whispers words of horror, and sups from the chalice one final time.

KillingCalafHeadstaverWithSpringleafAdds.name: Nature's Resilience
KillingCalafHeadstaverWithSpringleafAdds.predictiontext: You will defeat Calaf, Headstaver while holding Springleaf.
KillingCalafHeadstaverWithSpringleafAdds.flavourtext: Thieves camp beneath roadside trees, but it is their leader who falls like the mighty oak.

KillingChattersWithKaltenhaltAddsSpecifi.name: The Snuffed Flame
KillingChattersWithKaltenhaltAddsSpecifi.predictiontext: You will defeat Chatters while holding Kaltenhalt.
KillingChattersWithKaltenhaltAddsSpecifi.flavourtext: Cold bones rattle in stone cells, extinguishing all light, all warmth, all hope.

KillingHundredFootShadowWithScreamingEag.name: The Apex Predator
KillingHundredFootShadowWithScreamingEag.predictiontext: You will defeat the Hundred Foot Shadow while holding Screaming Eagle.
KillingHundredFootShadowWithScreamingEag.flavourtext: The eagle battles the vulture in the shadow of a dying sun, and becomes something greater.

KillingHammerstormWithLimbsplitAddsSpeci.name: Severed Limbs
KillingHammerstormWithLimbsplitAddsSpeci.predictiontext: You will defeat Hammerstorm while holding Limbsplit.
KillingHammerstormWithLimbsplitAddsSpeci.flavourtext: A storm of stone stops when the last of the limbs are severed and blood flows no more.

KillingVaalOversoulWithDoomfletchAddsSpe.name: Ancient Doom
KillingVaalOversoulWithDoomfletchAddsSpe.predictiontext: You will defeat the Vaal Oversoul while holding Doomfletch.
KillingVaalOversoulWithDoomfletchAddsSpe.flavourtext: Doom grows at the apex of the pyramid.

KillingKalFoxflyWithSilverbranchAddsSpec.name: The Silverwood
KillingKalFoxflyWithSilverbranchAddsSpec.predictiontext: You will defeat Targa, Beast Poacher while holding Silverbranch.
KillingKalFoxflyWithSilverbranchAddsSpec.flavourtext: A thief, bow in hand, flees to the wooded outskirts.

KillingFidelitasWithStormCloudAddsSpecif.name: The Servant's Heart
KillingFidelitasWithStormCloudAddsSpecif.predictiontext: You will defeat Fidelitas while holding Storm Cloud.
KillingFidelitasWithStormCloudAddsSpecif.flavourtext: The Servant's sacrifice summons a storm in the Prodigy's soul.

KillingSoulmournWithHrimnorsHymnAddsSpec.name: Winter's Mournful Melodies
KillingSoulmournWithHrimnorsHymnAddsSpec.predictiontext: You will defeat Soulmourn while holding Hrimnor's Hymn
KillingSoulmournWithHrimnorsHymnAddsSpec.flavourtext: A mournful hymn, a mournful soul, the chill of death on the wind.

KillingPietyWithReverberationRodAddsSpec.name: Power Magnified
KillingPietyWithReverberationRodAddsSpec.predictiontext: You will defeat Piety while holding Reverberation Rod
KillingPietyWithReverberationRodAddsSpec.flavourtext: The pious grow powerful surrounded by a sea of blood and empty husks

KillingGeofriWithRealmshaperAddsSpecific.name: The Beginning and the End
KillingGeofriWithRealmshaperAddsSpecific.predictiontext: You will defeat Archbishop Geofri while holding Realmshaper.
KillingGeofriWithRealmshaperAddsSpecific.flavourtext: The archbishop plays witness to his own cold death and cremation.

KillingBoneQueenWithQueensDecreeAddsSpec.name: The Misunderstood Queen
KillingBoneQueenWithQueensDecreeAddsSpec.predictiontext: You will defeat the Bone Queen while holding Queen's Decree.
KillingBoneQueenWithQueensDecreeAddsSpec.flavourtext: A queen of bone raises an army and flees among walls of flesh.

UniqueMonsterKillTurnsAllNormalMonstersI.name: SHOULD NOT APPEAR
UniqueMonsterKillTurnsAllNormalMonstersI.predictiontext: All normal monsters in area become magic - NOTE: Currently very laggy, do not enable

TheBlackStone1.name: The Black Stone I
TheBlackStone1.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on an Onyx Amulet, applying elemental resistances.
TheBlackStone1.flavourtext: The black stone senses resilience in you. It too grows resilient to outside influences.

TheBlackStone2.name: The Black Stone II
TheBlackStone2.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Augmentation on the Onyx Amulet, applying life.
TheBlackStone2.flavourtext: The black stone senses the joy of life in you. It feeds on this joy and grows more lively.

TheBlackStone3.name: The Black Stone III
TheBlackStone3.predictiontext: You will use a Regal Orb on the Onyx Amulet, applying critical strike chance.
TheBlackStone3.flavourtext: The black stone senses eagerness in you. It longs for the excitement of combat, of bloodshed.

TheBlackStone4.name: The Black Stone IV
TheBlackStone4.predictiontext: You will use an Exalted Orb on the Onyx Amulet, turning it into a powerful new item.
TheBlackStone4.flavourtext: The black stone learns from you. It is ready to shape each encounter in your favour.

RareRuinedTitanDropsClayShaper.name: The Walking Mountain
RareRuinedTitanDropsClayShaper.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Ruined Titan who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareRuinedTitanDropsClayShaper.flavourtext: Shaped by magic, the tool that breathes life into the titan's stone lies at its heart.

RareAxiomThunderGuardDropsStormPrison.name: The Prison Guard
RareAxiomThunderGuardDropsStormPrison.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Axiom Thunderguard who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareAxiomThunderGuardDropsStormPrison.flavourtext: Clad in black, the guard holds the key to unleashing the storm.

RareMadGladiatorDropsDaressosPassion.name: The Sword King's Passion
RareMadGladiatorDropsDaressosPassion.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareMadGladiatorDropsDaressosPassion.flavourtext: Once a challenger to the crown, he holds in his hands the Sword King's blade.

RareMurkRunnerDropsTheScreamingEagle.name: The Eagle's Cry
RareMurkRunnerDropsTheScreamingEagle.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Murk Runner who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareMurkRunnerDropsTheScreamingEagle.flavourtext: A flightless fowl charges through rotten wooden ribs; its scream gives even the battle-hardened pause.

RareDrippingDeadDropsLifesprig.name: From Death Springs Life
RareDrippingDeadDropsLifesprig.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareDrippingDeadDropsLifesprig.flavourtext: Fetid waters carry the dead downstream, but walking in the mud, the dead one carries life.

RareBrittlePoacherDropsStormCloud.name: Storm on the Horizon
RareBrittlePoacherDropsStormCloud.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Brittle Poacher who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBrittlePoacherDropsStormCloud.flavourtext: The poacher's bowstring snaps like dry bone and crackles like thunder.

RareSeethingBrineDropsWanderlust.name: A Firm Foothold
RareSeethingBrineDropsWanderlust.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Seething Brine who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareSeethingBrineDropsWanderlust.flavourtext: Water slicks the stone, a misstep chills the bone, the living pools hold the cure.

RareBeardedShamanDropsKaruiWard.name: The Ward's Ward
RareBeardedShamanDropsKaruiWard.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Bearded Shaman who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBeardedShamanDropsKaruiWard.flavourtext: The false shaman's death uncovers ancestral allurement locked in ancient stone.

RareDevourerDropsWideswing.name: Fear's Wide Reach
RareDevourerDropsWideswing.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Devourer who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareDevourerDropsWideswing.flavourtext: The unseen enemy travels through unseen tunnels. Its reach is small, but its effect is large.

RareBeardedDevilDropsAxiomPerpetuum.name: The Prison Key
RareBeardedDevilDropsAxiomPerpetuum.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Bearded Devil who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBeardedDevilDropsAxiomPerpetuum.flavourtext: The gate is unlocked, but the key remains in the hands of a devil.

RareOaksDevotedDropsRothsReach.name: Roth's Legacy
RareOaksDevotedDropsRothsReach.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Oak's Devoted who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareOaksDevotedDropsRothsReach.flavourtext: The devotee holds a relic of the pirate's past, looted and lost for an age.

RareAncientConstructDropsAtzirisFoible.name: The Soulless Beast
RareAncientConstructDropsAtzirisFoible.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Ancient Construct who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareAncientConstructDropsAtzirisFoible.flavourtext: Powered by twin wings, the mechanical monster roams the ruins.

RareSinLordDropsStoneOfLazhwar.name: The Sinner's Stone
RareSinLordDropsStoneOfLazhwar.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Sin Lord who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareSinLordDropsStoneOfLazhwar.flavourtext: A lord of sin roams hollow halls protected from the spells he sings.

RareDeathBishopDropsGeofrisBaptism.name: Baptism by Death
RareDeathBishopDropsGeofrisBaptism.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Death Bishop who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareDeathBishopDropsGeofrisBaptism.flavourtext: The bishop's flock is long gone, yet still he wields his hefty crook.

RareBlackguardArcmageDropsReverberationR.name: The Lady in Black
RareBlackguardArcmageDropsReverberationR.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Arcmage who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBlackguardArcmageDropsReverberationR.flavourtext: Lightning's hum grows louder and louder in the hands of the lady in black.

RareDockhandWraithDropsRothsReach.name: Against the Tide
RareDockhandWraithDropsRothsReach.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Dockhand Wraith who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareDockhandWraithDropsRothsReach.flavourtext: Taken by the fickle tides, the Captain's bow washes against the dock from which he set sail.

RareBlackguardEliteDropsFacebreaker.name: The Brutal Enforcer
RareBlackguardEliteDropsFacebreaker.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Elite who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBlackguardEliteDropsFacebreaker.flavourtext: In a society that values violence, the violent rise through the ranks like oil through water.

RareFlameSentinelDropsGoldrim.name: Graceful Flames
RareFlameSentinelDropsGoldrim.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Flame Sentinel who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareFlameSentinelDropsGoldrim.flavourtext: Crimson fabric flutters with fury and flame, but a gilded prize lies within.

RareDrownedDropsMoonbendersWing.name: Storm on the Reef
RareDrownedDropsMoonbendersWing.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Brine Vassal who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareDrownedDropsMoonbendersWing.flavourtext: Lightning flashes overhead. Bloated bodies wash ashore. One stands, walks, and stretches its wing.

RarePockedLanternbearerDropsTwyzel.name: The Petrified
RarePockedLanternbearerDropsTwyzel.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Pocked Lanternbearer who will drop a unique item when slain.
RarePockedLanternbearerDropsTwyzel.flavourtext: Lightless halls hewn in stone swell with the malformed, the twisted, the hardened and the dangerous.

RareVollsVanguardDropsDeathsHarp.name: The Vanguard
RareVollsVanguardDropsDeathsHarp.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Voll's Vanguard who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareVollsVanguardDropsDeathsHarp.flavourtext: The Vanguard lead the funereal march, playing hymns of death with their bowstrings.

RareUndyingEvangelistDropsTabulaRasa.name: Cleanser of Sins
RareUndyingEvangelistDropsTabulaRasa.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Undying Evangelist who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareUndyingEvangelistDropsTabulaRasa.flavourtext: The Evangelist does not practise what he preaches, but death wipes clean the slate.

RareFightingBullDropsMeginordsGirdle.name: Strong as a Bull
RareFightingBullDropsMeginordsGirdle.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Fighting Bull who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareFightingBullDropsMeginordsGirdle.flavourtext: Strength to rival the Karui King charges through the Sword King's dream.

RareSkulkingDwellerDropsWindsOfChange.name: The Lost Undying
RareSkulkingDwellerDropsWindsOfChange.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Skulking Dweller who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareSkulkingDwellerDropsWindsOfChange.flavourtext: Trapped with his emperor when the crown was taken, he seeks to change his fate.

RareFrostPriestDropsTheWhisperingIce.name: A Whispered Prayer
RareFrostPriestDropsTheWhisperingIce.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Frost Preacher who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareFrostPriestDropsTheWhisperingIce.flavourtext: A preacher whispers to the skies and the skies answer with a blanket of biting frost.

RareAncientArcherDropsDrillneck.name: The Last Watch
RareAncientArcherDropsDrillneck.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Ancient Archer who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareAncientArcherDropsDrillneck.flavourtext: A loyal soldier in life, he stands watch, bow in hand, waiting to be sent to the Mother of death.

RareSuturedAberrationDropsMaligarosVirtu.name: A Prodigious Hand
RareSuturedAberrationDropsMaligarosVirtu.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Sutured Aberration who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareSuturedAberrationDropsMaligarosVirtu.flavourtext: The dead one brought back to life by means other than corruption now holds the hands that revived it.

RareWanderingEyeDropsEyeOfChayula.name: The Watcher's Watcher
RareWanderingEyeDropsEyeOfChayula.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Wandering Eye who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareWanderingEyeDropsEyeOfChayula.flavourtext: Unblinking, it watches. Unendingly, it is watched.

RareKaomsChosenDropsHezemanasBloodlust.name: Blood of the Betrayed
RareKaomsChosenDropsHezemanasBloodlust.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Kaom's Chosen in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareKaomsChosenDropsHezemanasBloodlust.flavourtext: Slain by their king, they live only in memory, but their lust for blood remains unsated.

RareUndyingIncineratorDropsSireOfShards.name: Heart of the Fire
RareUndyingIncineratorDropsSireOfShards.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Solar Guard who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareUndyingIncineratorDropsSireOfShards.flavourtext: Its one desire is to see the world burn. A shard of fury stokes the undying fire in its heart.

RarePockedMinerDropsInfractem.name: Notched Flesh
RarePockedMinerDropsInfractem.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Pocked Mason who will drop a unique item when slain.
RarePockedMinerDropsInfractem.flavourtext: Stiff is the bow. Brittle is the flesh that holds it. Deep are the holes it leaves.

RareAssaultRibbonDropsTearOfPurity.name: Custodians of Silence
RareAssaultRibbonDropsTearOfPurity.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Assault Ribbon who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareAssaultRibbonDropsTearOfPurity.flavourtext: The temple untouched for centuries, the guardians clean and pure, yet they too must meet the Mother.

RareBonewarpedWarriorDropsBellyOfTheBeas.name: Flesh of the Beast
RareBonewarpedWarriorDropsBellyOfTheBeas.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Bonewarped Warrior who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBonewarpedWarriorDropsBellyOfTheBeas.flavourtext: Stripped of its flesh, a warrior fights to protect the piece of the beast it has carved.

RareCinderElementalDropsMarohiErqi.name: Fire, Wood and Stone
RareCinderElementalDropsMarohiErqi.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Cinder Elemental in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareCinderElementalDropsMarohiErqi.flavourtext: With crushing weight, the stone figure roams the halls. It burns eternally yet grows no lighter.

RareChaosSentinelDropsSingularity.name: Abnormal Effulgence
RareChaosSentinelDropsSingularity.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Chaos Sentinel in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareChaosSentinelDropsSingularity.flavourtext: Living stone and effulgence, nothing moves unhindered beneath the weight of its dark presence.

RareGalvanicRibbonDropsWindripper.name: Wind and Thunder
RareGalvanicRibbonDropsWindripper.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Galvanic Ribbon in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareGalvanicRibbonDropsWindripper.flavourtext: The dreaming fabric flutters and cracks in the wind like thunder. A sharp sound that freezes the blood.

RareUndyingArchivistDropsAstramentis.name: Lost in the Pages
RareUndyingArchivistDropsAstramentis.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Undying Archivist in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareUndyingArchivistDropsAstramentis.flavourtext: Hundreds of years with nothing but books twists a once great mind.

RareDrippingDeadDropsRainbowstrides.name: Weeping Death
RareDrippingDeadDropsRainbowstrides.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareDrippingDeadDropsRainbowstrides.flavourtext: Striding dryly through the mud, yet dripping with rot, he waits for the Mother's touch.

RareGutFlayerDropsBinosKitchenKnifeMap.name: The Flayed Man
RareGutFlayerDropsBinosKitchenKnifeMap.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Gut Flayer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareGutFlayerDropsBinosKitchenKnifeMap.flavourtext: The flayed becomes the flayer, stripping flesh from muscle with a sharpened edge.

RareTunnelerDropsPledgeOfHandsMap.name: The Hollow Pledge
RareTunnelerDropsPledgeOfHandsMap.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Tunneler in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareTunnelerDropsPledgeOfHandsMap.flavourtext: Grasping blindly through a dark dream, a final pledge turns brittle flesh to dust.

RareTalonArcherDropsVoltaxicRiftMap.name: A Call into the Void
RareTalonArcherDropsVoltaxicRiftMap.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Talon Archer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareTalonArcherDropsVoltaxicRiftMap.flavourtext: The dreaming cockerel crows thrice, and thunder bellows from the void.

RareMadGladiatorDropsTheBringerOfRainMap.name: Blood in the Eyes
RareMadGladiatorDropsTheBringerOfRainMap.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareMadGladiatorDropsTheBringerOfRainMap.flavourtext: Blood stains the fighter's eyes and rains upon the dirt. He sees and dreams in crimson.

RareBroodingTarantulaDropsRatsNestMap.name: The Nest
RareBroodingTarantulaDropsRatsNestMap.predictiontext: You will track down a powerful Noxious Tarantula in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
RareBroodingTarantulaDropsRatsNestMap.flavourtext: Rats become tangled in the spider's web; a meal within a nest within a dream.

SpawnNecromancerAndSkeletonsInArea.name: The Brothers of Necromancy
SpawnNecromancerAndSkeletonsInArea.predictiontext: You will encounter four necromancers with their undead minions and slay them all.
SpawnNecromancerAndSkeletonsInArea.flavourtext: Four of shared flesh and blood raise an army of borrowed blood and bone.

BloodlinePackDropsFiveOrbsOfFusing.name: Reforged Bonds
BloodlinePackDropsFiveOrbsOfFusing.flavourtext: A bond of blood breaks, but from the carnage new bonds may be formed.

MonsterKillChanceToSpawnCurrencyFountain.name: Overflowing Riches
MonsterKillChanceToSpawnCurrencyFountain.predictiontext: You will slay a foe who erupts into currency.
MonsterKillChanceToSpawnCurrencyFountain.flavourtext: A full pocket, severed, spills forth like a struck spring.

ThePlaguemaw1.name: The Plaguemaw I
ThePlaguemaw1.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful golem in a Vaal side area and defeat it.
ThePlaguemaw1.flavourtext: The Plaguemaw enters the red realm and leaves a swirling mass of living stone.

ThePlaguemaw2.name: The Plaguemaw II
ThePlaguemaw2.predictiontext: You will encounter shadowy monsters in the Crypt and slay them.
ThePlaguemaw2.flavourtext: The Plaguemaw's followers feed on the flesh of the dead; a desecration of the Mother's work.

ThePlaguemaw3.name: The Plaguemaw III
ThePlaguemaw3.predictiontext: You will be ambushed by the Plaguemaw's followers after you kill a certain very powerful monster.
ThePlaguemaw3.flavourtext: The Plaguemaw watches you with a glistening grin, waiting for a moment to send his shadows.

ThePlaguemaw4.name: The Plaguemaw IV
ThePlaguemaw4.predictiontext: You will be ambushed by the Plaguemaw's followers in the Imperial Gardens.
ThePlaguemaw4.flavourtext: In a maze of green, the Plaguemaw sets a trap baited with treasures.

ThePlaguemaw5.name: The Plaguemaw V
ThePlaguemaw5.predictiontext: You will enter the Plaguemaw's chamber in the Crystal Veins.
ThePlaguemaw5.flavourtext: A room, etched in crystal, plays home to the Plaguemaw. He awaits you.

PathOfTheThaumaturgist1.name: Thaumaturgical History I
PathOfTheThaumaturgist1.predictiontext: You will read Shavronne's Journal in the Warden's Quarters.
PathOfTheThaumaturgist1.flavourtext: The Aesthete's monstrous techniques are protected by the shadows.

PathOfTheThaumaturgist2.name: Thaumaturgical History II
PathOfTheThaumaturgist2.predictiontext: You will read Doedre's Proclamation in The Western Forest in Act 2.
PathOfTheThaumaturgist2.flavourtext: The Tongueless Witch's words speak through the stone to desperate followers.

PathOfTheThaumaturgist3.name: Thaumaturgical History III
PathOfTheThaumaturgist3.predictiontext: You will inspect the Ancient Reverie Device in the Chamber of Sins.
PathOfTheThaumaturgist3.flavourtext: The Soulless One's gift to the Prodigy draws forth those who seek the same unnatural power.

PathOfTheThaumaturgist4.name: Thaumaturgical History IV
PathOfTheThaumaturgist4.predictiontext: You will read Malachai's Dedication in The Harvest.
PathOfTheThaumaturgist4.flavourtext: Where the Soulless One left his physical form behind, a dangerous new threat emerges.

MapFairGravesBossOpensPortalToMaoKun.name: The Pirate's Den
MapFairGravesBossOpensPortalToMaoKun.predictiontext: You will slay Belcer, the Pirate Lord, and he will open portals to Mao Kun.
MapFairGravesBossOpensPortalToMaoKun.flavourtext: The pirate lord who hides in dank tunnels deep in dream will guide you to an island of treasure.

MapChaosGolemBossOpensPortalToMaelstromO.name: Enter the Maelström
MapChaosGolemBossOpensPortalToMaelstromO.predictiontext: You will slay Void Anomaly and he will open portals to Maelström of Chaos.
MapChaosGolemBossOpensPortalToMaelstromO.flavourtext: The swirling mass of dark stone stands at the centre of the dreaming storm.

MapKudukuBossOpensPortalToOlmecsSanctum.name: Sanctum of Stone
MapKudukuBossOpensPortalToOlmecsSanctum.predictiontext: You will slay The Idol Beyond and he will open portals to Olmec's Sanctum
MapKudukuBossOpensPortalToOlmecsSanctum.flavourtext: Break apart the wooden god, and a door to the stone sanctum appears.

MapMirageOfBonesOpensPortalToMirrorDeser.name: Through the Mirage
MapMirageOfBonesOpensPortalToMirrorDeser.predictiontext: You will slay Mirage of Bones and he will open portals to a mirror world.
MapMirageOfBonesOpensPortalToMirrorDeser.flavourtext: Washing away the mirage unveils a parallel path to walk.

AncientRivalries1.name: Ancient Rivalries I
AncientRivalries1.predictiontext: You will slay Brutus while wearing one of Shavronne's items.
AncientRivalries1.flavourtext: Her greatest creation failed her. The Aesthete seeks to punish the brute.

AncientRivalries2.name: Ancient Rivalries II
AncientRivalries2.predictiontext: You will slay Voll while wearing one of Doedre's items.
AncientRivalries2.flavourtext: Burned at the stake, the Tongueless Witch seeks to purify the purifier.

AncientRivalries3.name: Ancient Rivalries III
AncientRivalries3.predictiontext: You will slay Kaom while wearing one of Lioneye's items.
AncientRivalries3.flavourtext: Cut down on the shores, the Lion's fangs will sink into the Betraying King's flesh one last time.

AncientRivalries4.name: Ancient Rivalries IV
AncientRivalries4.predictiontext: You will slay Malachai while wearing one of Victario's items.
AncientRivalries4.flavourtext: The Soulless One tore the world asunder, but the Poet will have the final word.

TheFeralLord1.name: The Feral Lord I
TheFeralLord1.predictiontext: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Southern Forest and slay them.
TheFeralLord1.flavourtext: The Feral Lord in the southern wood twists the wild to his will.

TheFeralLord2.name: The Feral Lord II
TheFeralLord2.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful beast in the Northern Forest and slay it.
TheFeralLord2.flavourtext: The Feral Lord's cold breath imbues and empowers the beast in the northern wood.

TheFeralLord3.name: The Feral Lord III
TheFeralLord3.predictiontext: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Dried Lake and slay them.
TheFeralLord3.flavourtext: Where water shimmers no more, thunderous beasts are dragged into the Feral Lord's domain.

TheFeralLord4.name: The Feral Lord IV
TheFeralLord4.predictiontext: You will discover and slay a very powerful Vulture within Sarn's borders.
TheFeralLord4.flavourtext: The Feral Lord senses your presence. In the shell of the snail, the vulture seeks a fresh carcass.

TheFeralLord5.name: The Feral Lord V
TheFeralLord5.predictiontext: You will discover and slay a very powerful fiery Rhoa in a Mud Geyser map.
TheFeralLord5.flavourtext: To the realm of dreams the Feral Lord flees, and leaves in his wake a burning nightmare.

RatFlood.name: Plague of Rats
RatFlood.predictiontext: You will discover a series of indoor chambers flooded with rats.
RatFlood.flavourtext: They run, they bite, they flee, they die. Swarms of fur and teeth and tail drown each and every room.

AnarchysEnd1.name: Anarchy's End I
AnarchysEnd1.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay a Rogue Exile who is carrying a Divination Card.
AnarchysEnd1.flavourtext: A criminal of Theopolis flees into dream carrying a fortuneteller's tool.

AnarchysEnd2.name: Anarchy's End II
AnarchysEnd2.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay two Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
AnarchysEnd2.flavourtext: Two criminals carry the fortuneteller's tools as they hunt for the body of their dreaming ally.

AnarchysEnd3.name: Anarchy's End III
AnarchysEnd3.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay four Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
AnarchysEnd3.flavourtext: A party of four criminals, each with the mark of the fortuneteller, hunt through dreams for their prosecutor.

AnarchysEnd4.name: Anarchy's End IV
AnarchysEnd4.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay six Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
AnarchysEnd4.flavourtext: Six criminals take to foot to stamp out the threat that tracks them through dreams.

CompletingLabyrinthRewardsTwoEnchantment.name: Twice Enchanted
CompletingLabyrinthRewardsTwoEnchantment.predictiontext: You will be rewarded with two uses of the Enchantment Device on completing the Labyrinth
CompletingLabyrinthRewardsTwoEnchantment.flavourtext: A golden device hidden by a rotting emperor overflows with power.

StrongboxMonstersSpawnedAsMagicOrHigher.name: An Unseen Peril
StrongboxMonstersSpawnedAsMagicOrHigher.predictiontext: You will be attacked by stronger than normal monsters when opening a Strongbox.
StrongboxMonstersSpawnedAsMagicOrHigher.flavourtext: A trap is set, a lure is placed, but stronger foes lie in wait.

MysteriousInvadersFire.name: Mysterious Invaders
MysteriousInvadersFire.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
MysteriousInvadersFire.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

MysteriousInvadersCold.name: Mysterious Invaders
MysteriousInvadersCold.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
MysteriousInvadersCold.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

MysteriousInvadersLightning.name: Mysterious Invaders
MysteriousInvadersLightning.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
MysteriousInvadersLightning.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

MysteriousInvadersPhysical.name: Mysterious Invaders
MysteriousInvadersPhysical.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
MysteriousInvadersPhysical.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

MysteriousInvadersChaos.name: Mysterious Invaders
MysteriousInvadersChaos.predictiontext: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
MysteriousInvadersChaos.flavourtext: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

UndeadSpawnInOldFields.name: Undead Uprising
UndeadSpawnInOldFields.predictiontext: You will travel to the Old Fields, where you will encounter and slay an army of the undead.
UndeadSpawnInOldFields.flavourtext: The green and verdant field is swathed in night, the farmers who tended to it rise again.

DayOfSacrifice1.name: Day of Sacrifice I
DayOfSacrifice1.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful Vaal Fallen who will drop a Sacrifice at Dawn fragment.
DayOfSacrifice1.flavourtext: The ancient red champion is fallen, but a killing blow reveals his final sacrifice beneath the morning sun.

DayOfSacrifice2.name: Day of Sacrifice II
DayOfSacrifice2.predictiontext: You will open a corrupted rare strongbox that will contain a Sacrifice at Noon fragment.
DayOfSacrifice2.flavourtext: Beneath the midday sun, treasure, stained by corruption, invites an ambush.

DayOfSacrifice3.name: Day of Sacrifice III
DayOfSacrifice3.predictiontext: You will enter a difficult Vaal side area that contains an additional Sacrifice at Dusk fragment.
DayOfSacrifice3.flavourtext: The ancient red army opens a powerful path before the setting sun.

DayOfSacrifice4.name: Day of Sacrifice IV
DayOfSacrifice4.predictiontext: You will encounter an invading foe in a rare, corrupted map, who will drop a Sacrifice at Midnight fragment.
DayOfSacrifice4.flavourtext: A corrupted dream invites an invader, who hunts in the deepest night.

KillingRareGrantsShrineEffect.name: The Blessing
KillingRareGrantsShrineEffect.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe, and gain a shrine's blessing.
KillingRareGrantsShrineEffect.flavourtext: Malevolence swells and spreads in minds. The flesh is weak, but the gift is strong.

KillingRareStealsMods.name: Hunter's Lesson
KillingRareStealsMods.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe and gain its powers.
KillingRareStealsMods.flavourtext: An adversary, slain, briefly lives on in the lessons taught to the slayer.

KillingRareDropsRareItem.name: Gilded Within
KillingRareDropsRareItem.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe and it will drop a rare item.
KillingRareDropsRareItem.flavourtext: Gold without, gold within. Blood comes in many colours, but the gilded always bleed gold.

KillingUniqueDropsScouringOrb.name: Erased from Memory
KillingUniqueDropsScouringOrb.predictiontext: You will slay a very powerful foe and it will drop an Orb of Scouring.
KillingUniqueDropsScouringOrb.flavourtext: A foe feared for an aeon falls and is scoured from the pages of history.

KillingRareSpawnsTormentedSpirit.name: Ending the Torment
KillingRareSpawnsTormentedSpirit.predictiontext: You will slay a powerful foe who will release a Tormented Spirit.
KillingRareSpawnsTormentedSpirit.flavourtext: A fearsome foe's inner torment spills out into the world.

KillingMonsterSpawnsEmergingMagicMonster.name: Hidden Reinforcements
KillingMonsterSpawnsEmergingMagicMonster.predictiontext: You will be ambushed by several enemies upon slaying a foe.
KillingMonsterSpawnsEmergingMagicMonster.flavourtext: Cowardly foes lay in wait. A show of force reveals their true intentions.

KillingNormalRevivesAsRare.name: Rebirth
KillingNormalRevivesAsRare.predictiontext: You will slay a normal foe, who will be resurrected and granted new power.
KillingNormalRevivesAsRare.flavourtext: An ordinary life, an ordinary death, marked by an extraordinary rebirth.

UseWhetstoneGetMaxQuality.name: The Sharpened Blade
UseWhetstoneGetMaxQuality.predictiontext: You will greatly enhance the quality of a weapon with a single Blacksmith's Whetstone.
UseWhetstoneGetMaxQuality.flavourtext: The metal softens beneath the stone, reshaping with great ease.

UseArmourersScrapGetMaxQuality.name: The Hardened Armour
UseArmourersScrapGetMaxQuality.predictiontext: You will greatly enhance the quality of an armour piece with a single Armourer's Scrap
UseArmourersScrapGetMaxQuality.flavourtext: The rings that bind grow tighter, the plate thicker, the leather denser, all with a single touch.

TransmuteUpgradesItemToThreeModRare.name: Golden Touch
TransmuteUpgradesItemToThreeModRare.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on an item and it will grant extra mods.
TransmuteUpgradesItemToThreeModRare.flavourtext: Blue tendrils entangle and change. All that remains is gold.

TransmuteRingOrJewelAddLife.name: Vital Transformation
TransmuteRingOrJewelAddLife.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring or amulet and it will gain a life mod.
TransmuteRingOrJewelAddLife.flavourtext: Blue tendrils envelop, breathing life into the beautifully inert.

TransmuteEquipmentAddResistance.name: Resistant to Change
TransmuteEquipmentAddResistance.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring, shield, or amulet, and it will gain resistances.
TransmuteEquipmentAddResistance.flavourtext: Wreathed in blue sinew, it is protected from the flames, the storms and the snow alike.

TransmuteBootsAddMovementSpeed.name: Touched by the Wind
TransmuteBootsAddMovementSpeed.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a pair of boots and it will gain movement speed.
TransmuteBootsAddMovementSpeed.flavourtext: Stitched with blue thread, a swift boot covers great distances.

DivinationCardSpawnsWithJackInTheBoxAlso.name: The Pair
DivinationCardSpawnsWithJackInTheBoxAlso.predictiontext: You will slay a foe and it will drop two Divination cards.
DivinationCardSpawnsWithJackInTheBoxAlso.flavourtext: One carries the fortune teller's mark, not knowing that a second surprise lies with it.

UseChiselGetMaxQuality.name: The Beautiful Guide
UseChiselGetMaxQuality.predictiontext: You will greatly enhance the quality of a map with a single Cartographer's Chisel.
UseChiselGetMaxQuality.flavourtext: A single tap from the chisel, and the guide's marks grow far clearer.

ReceiveARareItemGetFourMirroredInstead.name: Kalandra's Craft
ReceiveARareItemGetFourMirroredInstead.predictiontext: You will slay a foe who drops four identical rare items.
ReceiveARareItemGetFourMirroredInstead.flavourtext: A grand treasure fractures like a dropped mirror, yet somehow goes unharmed.

TransmuteMapAddMod.name: Smothering Tendrils
TransmuteMapAddMod.predictiontext: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a map and it will gain a smothering atmosphere.
TransmuteMapAddMod.flavourtext: Blue tendrils wrap around the markings, constricting and smothering the stone beneath.

MapExtraStrongboxes.name: Bountiful Traps
MapExtraStrongboxes.predictiontext: You will enter a map that holds six additional Strongboxes.
MapExtraStrongboxes.flavourtext: In a distant dream, six traps with the promise of treasure wait to be sprung.

MapExtraRogueExiles.name: The Four Feral Exiles
MapExtraRogueExiles.predictiontext: You will find four Rogue Exiles in a map and slay them.
MapExtraRogueExiles.flavourtext: In a faraway dream, four souls far from home prepare to fight to the death.

MapTwinned.name: Deadly Twins
MapTwinned.predictiontext: You will enter a map and slay the Twinned bosses in it.
MapTwinned.flavourtext: In a long-lost dream, one deadly foe becomes two.

ReadLoreGrantsWisdomScrolls.name: Lasting Impressions
ReadLoreGrantsWisdomScrolls.predictiontext: You will read something written long ago.
ReadLoreGrantsWisdomScrolls.flavourtext: A hand scrawls on a wall, or carves into bone, a tale that undoes the world and teaches those who come after.

MapTempestFire.name: Fire from the Sky
MapTempestFire.predictiontext: You will discover an area with an Infernal Tempest
MapTempestFire.flavourtext: Fire rains down across the land. Beware the path you take.

MapTempestIce.name: Ice from Above
MapTempestIce.predictiontext: You will discover an area with an Arctic Tempest
MapTempestIce.flavourtext: The cold blusters from above, chilling the unwary to the bone.

MapTempestLightning.name: Lightning Falls
MapTempestLightning.predictiontext: You will discover an area with an Electrocuting Tempest
MapTempestLightning.flavourtext: The storms above strike with precision. A deft foot will avoid the blows.

MapTempestUndead.name: The Undead Storm
MapTempestUndead.predictiontext: You will discover an area with a Morbid Tempest
MapTempestUndead.flavourtext: Bones fall from the sky and take the shape of the men they once were.

MapTempestPhysical.name: Crushing Squall
MapTempestPhysical.predictiontext: You will discover an area with a Crushing Tempest
MapTempestPhysical.flavourtext: The sky trembles and the ground below answers with crushing force.

MapTempestCorrupt.name: Vaal Winds
MapTempestCorrupt.predictiontext: You will discover an area with a Corrupting Tempest
MapTempestCorrupt.flavourtext: Corruption is carried on a red wind, and spreads to all who are touched.

UniqueFireGolemAtFireFurysCamp.name: Living Fires
UniqueFireGolemAtFireFurysCamp.predictiontext: You will discover a powerful fire golem at Fire Fury's camp in The Coast.
UniqueFireGolemAtFireFurysCamp.flavourtext: Where the sand meets the water, the flesheater's flames shine brighter and brighter still.

FarmerSkeletonsAtRuinedHouse.name: Fallow At Last
FarmerSkeletonsAtRuinedHouse.predictiontext: You will fight waves of risen farmers amongst the ruins of a house in Crossroads.
FarmerSkeletonsAtRuinedHouse.flavourtext: The farmer's time came long ago, his ruined home the site of a dark harvest.

KaruiWarriorsNearWeatheredCarvings.name: Path of Betrayal
KaruiWarriorsNearWeatheredCarvings.predictiontext: You will encounter Karui Spirits near Weathered Carvings, and send them back to Hinekora.
KaruiWarriorsNearWeatheredCarvings.flavourtext: Cut down by the king's hand, southern spirits linger near the bones of giants.

WeaponsRiseUpAroundLioneyesStandard.name: The Forgotten Soldiers
WeaponsRiseUpAroundLioneyesStandard.predictiontext: You will encounter the risen weapons of a fallen army around Lioneye's Standard in The Climb.
WeaponsRiseUpAroundLioneyesStandard.flavourtext: The banner in the breeze marks the resting place of lions, whose metal fangs still thirst for blood.

GoldenWaterElementalsRiseFromGoldPiles.name: Pools of Wealth
GoldenWaterElementalsRiseFromGoldPiles.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay golden elementals deep in the Cavern of Anger.
GoldenWaterElementalsRiseFromGoldPiles.flavourtext: Beckoned by the Siren's song, wrathful gold rises from the ground.

ChildOfLunarisAppearsInChapel.name: The Child of Lunaris
ChildOfLunarisAppearsInChapel.predictiontext: Near the Crossroads, you will encounter the Child of Lunaris in the ruins of a temple, and slay it.
ChildOfLunarisAppearsInChapel.flavourtext: The light of Lunaris shines on her child who walks in stone shrine's ruins.

ArmyOfUndeadSoldiersAppearInRuinedFortre.name: The Forgotten Garrison
ArmyOfUndeadSoldiersAppearInRuinedFortre.predictiontext: Near the Broken Bridge, you will encounter and slay an army of undead in the ruins of the fortress.
ArmyOfUndeadSoldiersAppearInRuinedFortre.flavourtext: Where bandits have taken hold, a lifeless army rises to guard the ruined fortress.

TheStockkeeperAppears.name: The Stockkeeper
TheStockkeeperAppears.predictiontext: You will encounter the Stockkeeper at the Grain Gate and slay him.
TheStockkeeperAppears.flavourtext: A man survives only by his greed, but a single weapon cuts down the man who has many.

UniqueLightningGolemAppearsOutsideBubble.name: Unnatural Energy
UniqueLightningGolemAppearsOutsideBubble.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful Lightning Elemental near the Battlefront bridge.
UniqueLightningGolemAppearsOutsideBubble.flavourtext: Unnatural energies hold those in black at bay, but the barrier bends for crackling kin.

TwoUniqueBlackguardCaptainsAppearAtFarEn.name: Holding the Bridge
TwoUniqueBlackguardCaptainsAppearAtFarEn.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay two powerful Blackguard captains near the Ebony Barracks bridge.
TwoUniqueBlackguardCaptainsAppearAtFarEn.flavourtext: Where those in black swarm across the stone steps, one's blood runs cold with hatred and one's eyes crackle with wrath.

UniqueZombieBlackguardAtRuinedCart.name: In the Grasp of Corruption
UniqueZombieBlackguardAtRuinedCart.predictiontext: You will encounter a powerful undead Blackguard in the Imperial Gardens.
UniqueZombieBlackguardAtRuinedCart.flavourtext: A soldier in black's journey is cut short at the foot of the tower. The flesh rots, but the bone grows yet.

RareLunarisMiscreationsAppearAtScionCage.name: Defiled in the Sceptre
RareLunarisMiscreationsAppearAtScionCage.predictiontext: You will encounter a group of strong miscreations in the Upper Sceptre of God, and slay them all.
RareLunarisMiscreationsAppearAtScionCage.flavourtext: Stolen from their homes, innocent flesh is twisted and shaped atop the tower.

Tier1MapsSpawnedAtMapDevice.name: The Lost Maps
Tier1MapsSpawnedAtMapDevice.predictiontext: You will find maps near the centre of the Chamber of Sins.
Tier1MapsSpawnedAtMapDevice.flavourtext: A device of great power once held by the prodigy spills forth the keys to new worlds.

AreaAllRaresAreCloned.name: The Twins
AreaAllRaresAreCloned.predictiontext: You will encounter an area where powerful monsters are duplicated.
AreaAllRaresAreCloned.flavourtext: What was one is now two. The strong find greater strength in numbers.

AreaAllUniquesArePossessedByTormentedSpi.name: Possessed Foe
AreaAllUniquesArePossessedByTormentedSpi.predictiontext: You will encounter one or more very powerful monsters possessed by a Tormented Spirit.
AreaAllUniquesArePossessedByTormentedSpi.flavourtext: A name remembered all this time, their will stolen by a vengeful spirit.

KillingTormentedSpiritTouchesAllMonsters.name: Touched by Death
KillingTormentedSpiritTouchesAllMonsters.predictiontext: You will kill a Tormented Spirit who then touches all other monsters. - NOTE: Currently very laggy
KillingTormentedSpiritTouchesAllMonsters.flavourtext: A tormented soul makes one final grasp at vengeance.

AreaHasVaalMonstersAndOversoul.name: Vaal Invasion
AreaHasVaalMonstersAndOversoul.predictiontext: You will find Vaal invaders in the Temple of Lunaris and destroy the monster who is leading them.
AreaHasVaalMonstersAndOversoul.flavourtext: At the site of a great atrocity, the shadows of the distant past hang over the risen red army.

AreaHasOnlyStrongboxes.name: Monstrous Treasure
AreaHasOnlyStrongboxes.predictiontext: You will travel to a map where the monsters lie in wait, open the boxes they guard, and slay them all.
AreaHasOnlyStrongboxes.flavourtext: In a long lost dream, great foes hide in tiny boxes, but so do great rewards.

AreaIsLikeCorruptedSideArea.name: The Spread of Corruption
AreaIsLikeCorruptedSideArea.predictiontext: You will find and cleanse a location where the corruption of the Vaal has spread.
AreaIsLikeCorruptedSideArea.flavourtext: Corruption spreads thick and fast, so too do those who revere it.

FrogFlood.name: Plague of Frogs
FrogFlood.predictiontext: You will discover an outdoor location flooded with frogs.
FrogFlood.flavourtext: Wet and slippery flesh, clinging feet and tongue. No matter the colour before, now the earth is green.

AreaContainsWashedUpCorpses.name: Visions of the Drowned
AreaContainsWashedUpCorpses.predictiontext: You will find an area littered with the drowned.
AreaContainsWashedUpCorpses.flavourtext: Damp and bloated with water and goods. Sometimes treasure washes ashore.

MapContainsTrial.name: The Dream Trial
MapContainsTrial.predictiontext: You will discover a Trial of Ascendancy in a map.
MapContainsTrial.flavourtext: The depths of a dream hide a gauntlet that sharpens the body and mind.

AreaSpawnsUndead.name: Soil, Worms and Blood
AreaSpawnsUndead.predictiontext: You will discover an area with large packs of Undead monsters.
AreaSpawnsUndead.flavourtext: The unliving crowd into the dwellings of unlikely allies.

AreaSpawnsInsectsAndQueens.name: The Hungering Swarm
AreaSpawnsInsectsAndQueens.predictiontext: You will discover an area with large packs of Insects.
AreaSpawnsInsectsAndQueens.flavourtext: Skittering across the ground, insects nest near unlikely allies.

AreaSpawnsSeaWitchesAndSpawn.name: The Cursed Choir
AreaSpawnsSeaWitchesAndSpawn.predictiontext: You will discover an area with large packs of Sea Witches.
AreaSpawnsSeaWitchesAndSpawn.flavourtext: The sea witch whispers sweet nothings, and calms the hearts of unlikely allies.

AreaSpawnsRareDevourers.name: The Trembling Earth
AreaSpawnsRareDevourers.predictiontext: You will discover an area with many Devourers.
AreaSpawnsRareDevourers.flavourtext: The earth shifts beneath the feet of many, but they are not the prey this monster seeks.

AreaContainsInvasionBoss.name: The Invader
AreaContainsInvasionBoss.predictiontext: You will encounter a very powerful invading monster and slay it.
AreaContainsInvasionBoss.flavourtext: A horror from the past returns to cause pain in a place that it never called home.

UnbearableWhispers1.name: Unbearable Whispers I
UnbearableWhispers1.predictiontext: You will discover a tome in the Library.
UnbearableWhispers1.flavourtext: Dark runes skitter across the pages of the tome, concealing the Whisperer's allies.

UnbearableWhispers2.name: Unbearable Whispers II
UnbearableWhispers2.predictiontext: You will discover a tome upon slaying a monster in the Sceptre of God.
UnbearableWhispers2.flavourtext: The Whisperer leaves a tome in the tower, held by a maddened follower.

UnbearableWhispers3.name: Unbearable Whispers III
UnbearableWhispers3.predictiontext: You will slay Shavronne, and she will drop a tome.
UnbearableWhispers3.flavourtext: The Aesthete holds the Whisperer's forbidden words safe, deep in the beast's belly.

UnbearableWhispers4.name: Unbearable Whispers IV
UnbearableWhispers4.predictiontext: You will slay a certain powerful monster and it will drop a tome.
UnbearableWhispers4.flavourtext: Forbidden words ring in the ears of the powerful; the Whisperer's influence spreads.

UnbearableWhispers5.name: Unbearable Whispers V
UnbearableWhispers5.predictiontext: You will discover a dangerous tome in the final chamber of the Labyrinth.
UnbearableWhispers5.flavourtext: The trapped emperor unknowingly protects foul knowledge. Dark pages amongst bright treasures.

TheUnbreathingQueen1.name: The Unbreathing Queen I
TheUnbreathingQueen1.predictiontext: You will encounter spectres in the Fellshrine Ruins and slay them.
TheUnbreathingQueen1.flavourtext: The Unbreathing Queen masterminds an unholy heist, a defilement of the dead.

TheUnbreathingQueen2.name: The Unbreathing Queen II
TheUnbreathingQueen2.predictiontext: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Lord's Labyrinth and defeat it.
TheUnbreathingQueen2.flavourtext: The flesh is taken by the Unbreathing Queen. But the hero's soul, bitter and cold, remains trapped in the Emperor's greatest trial.

TheUnbreathingQueen3.name: The Unbreathing Queen III
TheUnbreathingQueen3.predictiontext: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Beacon and defeat it
TheUnbreathingQueen3.flavourtext: Water crashes against stone; A victim of the Unbreathing Queen burns with desire for The Mother's domain.

TheUnbreathingQueen4.name: The Unbreathing Queen IV
TheUnbreathingQueen4.predictiontext: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Temple of Decay and defeat it.
TheUnbreathingQueen4.flavourtext: A tangle of web trapped the body, now stolen. The Unbreathing Queen leaves behind a sorrowful soul whose howls thunder through the halls.

TheUnbreathingQueen5.name: The Unbreathing Queen V
TheUnbreathingQueen5.predictiontext: You will defeat the Unbreathing Queen in a Cemetery map.
TheUnbreathingQueen5.flavourtext: The Unbreathing Queen raises an army in a dream of tombs and graves. She knows you are coming.

TheAmbitiousBandit1.name: The Ambitious Bandit I
TheAmbitiousBandit1.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay bandits in an area where they do not ordinarily appear.
TheAmbitiousBandit1.flavourtext: A bandit's ambition grows, and so too does the path it walks.

TheAmbitiousBandit2.name: The Ambitious Bandit II
TheAmbitiousBandit2.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Marketplace.
TheAmbitiousBandit2.flavourtext: A bandit seeks a relic for the greedy where greed was once a great virtue.

TheAmbitiousBandit3.name: The Ambitious Bandit III
TheAmbitiousBandit3.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Library.
TheAmbitiousBandit3.flavourtext: Where relics and tomes gather dust, a bandit's eyes see great value.

DeadlyRivalry1.name: Deadly Rivalry I
DeadlyRivalry1.predictiontext: You will encounter a rival Exile imbued with Nemesis powers.
DeadlyRivalry1.flavourtext: You draw the ire of another, imbued with golden power.

DeadlyRivalry2.name: Deadly Rivalry II
DeadlyRivalry2.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now also imbued with Onslaught.
DeadlyRivalry2.flavourtext: Their defeat will not stand, renewed and fueled by blind rage.

DeadlyRivalry3.name: Deadly Rivalry III
DeadlyRivalry3.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now possessed by a Tormented Spirit.
DeadlyRivalry3.flavourtext: Their body broken and mended, now a conduit for a greater power.

DeadlyRivalry4.name: Deadly Rivalry IV
DeadlyRivalry4.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now imbued with the powers of a Shrine
DeadlyRivalry4.flavourtext: Prayer at a dark altar mends torn flesh once again, but darkness still fills the soul. Each defeat feeds their determination.

DeadlyRivalry5.name: Deadly Rivalry V
DeadlyRivalry5.predictiontext: You will encounter the rival Exile, now backed by others of a shared Bloodline.
DeadlyRivalry5.flavourtext: Allies arrive for a final battle, filled with shared blood. The breaking and mending takes its toll.

TheWarmongers1.name: The Warmongers I
TheWarmongers1.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands.
TheWarmongers1.flavourtext: A vanguard seeks to claim land that is not theirs.

TheWarmongers2.name: The Warmongers II
TheWarmongers2.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their reinforcements.
TheWarmongers2.flavourtext: The vanguard did not return, so more have followed their path, bringing war with them.

TheWarmongers3.name: The Warmongers III
TheWarmongers3.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their elite soldiers.
TheWarmongers3.flavourtext: Failure twice draws the ire of higher ranking soldiers. They come to spill blood.

TheWarmongers4.name: The Warmongers IV
TheWarmongers4.predictiontext: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their leader.
TheWarmongers4.flavourtext: The leader arrives, and lays plans to paint the land red with your blood.

BeyondSight1.name: Beyond Sight I
BeyondSight1.predictiontext: You will slay the cultists and the foes they summon.
BeyondSight1.flavourtext: A dark presence hides just out of sight. Only bodies betray its movements.

BeyondSight2.name: Beyond Sight II
BeyondSight2.predictiontext: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.
BeyondSight2.flavourtext: A visible following forms around an invisible foe. It grows greater yet remains veiled.

BeyondSight3.name: Beyond Sight III
BeyondSight3.predictiontext: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.
BeyondSight3.flavourtext: Monsters not of this world spill forth. Only shapes and movement. A warped vision.

BeyondSight4.name: Beyond Sight IV
BeyondSight4.predictiontext: You will slay the Herald of Bameth and the very powerful foe it summons.
BeyondSight4.flavourtext: My vision grows dark. A horror draws near. Its soul would be a treasured prize for Hinekora.

ChestWithDivinationCards.name: The Fortune Teller's Collection
ChestWithDivinationCards.predictiontext: You will find a chest containing Divination Cards in a map.
ChestWithDivinationCards.flavourtext: The dreaming seeker finds what a fortune teller forgets.

IcetombFated.name: End of the Light
IcetombFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Tsoagoth, The Brine King while holding Icetomb.
IcetombFated.flavourtext: The king rots in his frozen tomb, atop the island of his own creation.

WondertrapFated.name: Greed's Folly
WondertrapFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Guardian of the Vault while holding Wondertrap.
WondertrapFated.flavourtext: A trap of greed is laid in the Vault, and sprung at its heart by a wonder.

BriskwrapFated.name: Last of the Wildmen
BriskwrapFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Master of the Blade while holding Briskwrap.
BriskwrapFated.flavourtext: The Master's blade strikes the ground, and his body briskly follows. The line of the Wild Men ends.

SundanceFated.name: Sun's Punishment
SundanceFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Dawn, Harbinger of Solaris while holding Sundance.
SundanceFated.flavourtext: Death's dance with dawn leads to the midday sun, whose spiteful zenith burns indiscriminately.

WindscreamFated.name: Darktongue's Shriek
WindscreamFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Doedre the Defiler while holding Windscream.
WindscreamFated.flavourtext: Where the dead still rest, the defiler's scream bellows through the tombs before falling eternally silent.

DusktoeFated.name: Agony at Dusk
DusktoeFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Maligaro, The Inquisitor while holding Dusktoe.
DusktoeFated.flavourtext: In the beast's belly, the Inquisitor hunts the dying light.

MeginordsViseFated.name: Fall of the Tower
MeginordsViseFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Tore, Towering Ancient while holding Meginord's Vise.
MeginordsViseFated.flavourtext: The ancient tower stands for now, but crumbles beneath a strong hand.

DoedresTenureFated.name: The Malevolent Witch
DoedresTenureFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Erythrophagia while holding Doedre's Tenure.
DoedresTenureFated.flavourtext: Silence and darkness harbour growing malevolence as the blood eater meets her maker.

HeatshiverFated.name: A Vision of Ice and Fire
HeatshiverFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Sumter the Twisted while holding Heatshiver.
HeatshiverFated.flavourtext: Where the river meets the sea, the flames meet winter's chill, and heated battle sends a shiver down a twisted spine.

TimeclaspFated.name: A Rift in Time
TimeclaspFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Riftwalker while holding Timeclasp.
TimeclaspFated.flavourtext: The rift is torn open, and time's clasp is twisted.

AtzirisMirrorFated.name: The Queen's Sacrifice
AtzirisMirrorFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Atziri, Queen of the Vaal in the Alluring Abyss while holding Atziri's Mirror.
AtzirisMirrorFated.flavourtext: The ancient queen casts her gaze upon her reflection, and at last the curse is broken.

QuecholliFated.name: The Fall of an Empire
QuecholliFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Shadow of the Vaal while holding Quecholli.
QuecholliFated.flavourtext: The Vaal's dark machinery was their greatest triumph, and its destruction another's destiny.

FencoilFated.name: Trapped in the Tower
FencoilFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Caliga, Imperatrix while holding Fencoil.
FencoilFated.flavourtext: The Imperatrix traps her subjects in the shining sceptre, but it is she who becomes mired.

TheStormheartFated.name: The Storm Spire
TheStormheartFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Poporo, the Highest Spire while holding The Stormheart.
TheStormheartFated.flavourtext: Cold ocean winds whip across the sharp stones where two yet battle for control.

FoxshadeFated.name: Dark Instincts
FoxshadeFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows while holding Foxshade.
FoxshadeFated.flavourtext: Guided by luck, the fox hunts the spider in absolute shadow.

AsenathsMarkFated.name: Song of the Sekhema
AsenathsMarkFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Garukhan, Queen of the Winds while holding Asenath's Mark.
AsenathsMarkFated.flavourtext: The Sekhema's whispers fight back the wind, leaving no mark remaining.

HonourhomeFated.name: Honour Held
HonourhomeFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Eater of Souls while holding Honourhome.
HonourhomeFated.flavourtext: A lone soul escapes the Eater with their honour held firm.

MalachaisSimulaFated.name: The Nightmare Awakens
MalachaisSimulaFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Eater of Souls while holding Malachai's Simula.
MalachaisSimulaFated.flavourtext: The Eater has his final meal, and the Soulless One awakens.

SidhebreathFated.name: WIP
SidhebreathFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Xixic, High Necromancer while holding Sidhebreath.

TheIgnomonFated.name: Blind Faith
TheIgnomonFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Barthol, the Pure while holding The Ignomon.
TheIgnomonFated.flavourtext: Two sides, light and dark, collide, and leave all but one blind.

TheMagnateFated1.name: The Great Mind of the North
TheMagnateFated1.predictiontext: You will defeat Hector Titucius, Eternal Servant while holding The Magnate.
TheMagnateFated1.flavourtext: The Eternal servant bathes in his own blood, and a master tactician is born.

TheMagnateFated2.name: The Great Leader of the North
TheMagnateFated2.predictiontext: You will defeat Boulderback while holding The Magnate.
TheMagnateFated2.flavourtext: The boulder is crushed atop the hill, letting the great leader's people pass.

BloodboilFated.name: Cold Blooded Fury
BloodboilFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Glace while holding Bloodboil.
BloodboilFated.flavourtext: Winter weaves the cannibal's cold fury until his blood boils over.

HyrrisBiteFated.name: A Dishonourable Death
HyrrisBiteFated.predictiontext: You will defeat The Dishonoured Queen while holding Hyrri's Bite.
HyrrisBiteFated.flavourtext: The dishonoured niece of the king is decisively laid to rest by her own bite.

DreadarcFated.name: Burning Dread
DreadarcFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Piety the Empyrean while holding Dreadarc.
DreadarcFated.flavourtext: The Empyrian faces her dread and perishes; her arc now complete.

GoredrillFated.name: Crimson Hues
GoredrillFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Visceris while holding Goredrill.
GoredrillFated.flavourtext: The ruins hide an artist whose own crimson ink coats the stone.

GeofrisBaptismFated.name: Black Devotion
GeofrisBaptismFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Litanius, the Black Prayer while holding Geofri's Baptism.
GeofrisBaptismFated.flavourtext: The Black Prayer falls silent in the face of the Archbishop's shimmering devotion.

CameriasMaulFated.name: Cold Greed
CameriasMaulFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Fragment of Winter while holding Cameria's Maul.
CameriasMaulFated.flavourtext: Avarice turns the heart as cold as a fragment of Winter itself.

RedbeakFated.name: The Dreaded Rhoa
RedbeakFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Skullbeak while holding Redbeak.
RedbeakFated.flavourtext: The rhoa's rage builds and boils over; a feeling of dread envelops the crimson beak.

TheDancingDervishFated.name: Dance of Steel
TheDancingDervishFated.predictiontext: You will defeat The Steel Soul while holding The Dancing Dervish.
TheDancingDervishFated.flavourtext: A soul of steel shatters, and a spinning shard joins the eternal dance.

EclipseSolarisFated.name: Blinding Light
EclipseSolarisFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Jorus, Sky's Edge while holding Eclipse Solaris.
EclipseSolarisFated.flavourtext: The light fades from one source but grows in another, blinding those who approach.

IronHeartFated.name: Battle Hardened
IronHeartFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Tyrant while holding Iron Heart.
IronHeartFated.flavourtext: The eager warrior meets the Tyrant in battle. Outmatched and outwitted; he uses his strength to best his foe.

ChoberChaberFated.name: Faith Exhumed
ChoberChaberFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Tolman, the Exhumer while holding Chober Chaber.
ChoberChaberFated.flavourtext: The lost lover returns, but faith releases him from his service.

MatuaTupunaFated.name: The Mentor
MatuaTupunaFated.predictiontext: You will defeat The Cleansing Light while holding Matua Tupuna.
MatuaTupunaFated.flavourtext: One falls, but another rises to lead.

GeofrisCrestFated.name: The Bishop's Legacy
GeofrisCrestFated.predictiontext: You will defeat Pagan Bishop of Agony while holding Geofri's Crest.
GeofrisCrestFated.flavourtext: The crest becomes a crown when placed upon the Bishop's brow.
